name: DeployTabularModelTask
description: Publish a tabular cube model to an SSAS instance
author: Dr. John Tunnicliffe

inputs.name: AsDatabasePath
inputs.label: Path to .asdatabase file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path from repo root to the AsDatabase file to publish.  Wildcards can be used.  Note that the repo root is held in the variable $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: AsServer
inputs.label: SSAS Server Name or IP address
inputs.helpMarkDown: SSAS Server Name or IP address.  Include the instance name and port if necessary (e.g. myserver\myinstance,myport)

inputs.name: CubeDatabaseName
inputs.label: The name of the cube as it should be deployed on the target server
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the cube as it should be deployed on the target server. Can be different from the AsDatabase name.

inputs.name: PreferredVersion
inputs.label: Version of Microsoft.AnalysisServices.Deployment.exe to use for the deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the preferred version cannot be found, the latest version will be used instead.

inputs.name: ProcessingOption
inputs.label: Cube Processing Option
inputs.helpMarkDown: Determines if the cube is processed as part of the deployment. Strongly recommend you DO NOT process at this stage as the Data Source connection string may be incorrect.

inputs.name: TransactionalDeployment
inputs.label: Transactional deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Perform the deployment in one transaction

inputs.name: PartitionDeployment
inputs.label: Partition deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Deploy partitions: Any existing partition will be replaced
Retain partitions: Partitions for new measure groups will be deployed, but partitions for existing measure groups will be unaffected

inputs.name: RoleDeployment
inputs.label: Role deployment
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Deploy roles and retain members: Roles will be deployed along with their members for new roles. Members for existing roles will be retained.
Deploy roles and members: Any existing roles and members will be replaced
Retain roles and members: The roles and members will not be deployed

inputs.name: ConfigurationSettingsDeployment
inputs.label: Retain configuration settings for existing objects
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retain configuration settings for existing objects or deploy new ones

options.Retain: Retain configuration settings for existing objects

inputs.name: OptimizationSettingsDeployment
inputs.label: Retain optimization settings for existing objects
inputs.helpMarkDown: Retain optimization settings for existing objects or deploy new ones

options.Retain: Retain optimization settings for existing objects
